item.title: Top Secure Browsers for Privacy Protection: Brave, Firefox, and Tor
item.category: "secure browsers" , "privacy protection" , "Brave browser" , "Firefox" , "Tor" , "online security" , "internet privacy" , "browser features" , "ad-blocking" , "tracking protection" , "open-source" , "cross-platform" , "Firefox Focus" , "Tor Network" , "alternative browsers" , "Vivaldi" , "Epic" , "Puffin" , "Waterfox"
item.description: Discover the best secure browsers for privacy protection, featuring Brave, Firefox, and Tor, and learn about their features and benefits.

item.title: Recommended Organizations to Support
item.category: "Recommended Organizations" , "Support" , "Online Privacy" , "Freedom of Expression" , "Democratic Values" , "EPIC" , "EFF" , "Privacy" , "Civil Liberties" , "Human Rights" , "Digital Activism" , "Nonprofit Organizations" , "Donation" , "Digital Rights" , "Data Protection" , "Cybersecurity" , "Net Neutrality" , "Online Anonymity" , "Censorship"
item.description: Support the Electronic Privacy Information Center (EPIC) and Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF) to protect online privacy, freedom of expression, and democratic values. Donate to defend human rights and liberties in the digital world.
